text: yadi apani taderake jijnesa karena, asamana o yamina ke srsti kareche? Tara abasya'i balabe-allaha. Baluna, tomara bhebe dekhecha ki, yadi allaha amara anista karara iccha karena, tabe tomara allaha byatita yaderake daka, tara ki se anista dura karate parabe? Athaba tini amara prati rahamata karara iccha karale tara ki se rahamata rodha karate parabe? Baluna, amara pakse allaha'i yathesta. Nirbharakarira tamra'i upara nirbhara kare.
